content: I've been feeling really stressed at work lately. The deadlines are overwhelming.
I hear you. Work stress is common. Can you tell me more about what's causing the stress?
I'm feeling much better today! The new project is exciting and the team is supportive.
That's wonderful to hear! It sounds like you're in a good place right now.
I'm worried about my performance review next week. I don't think I've met expectations.
